programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: (2014) Tense thriller with Tom Hardy, James Gandolfini, Noomi Rapace and Matthias Schoenaerts. Two cousins get into trouble with the gangsters who use their bar to launder illicit cash.

programme.title: You Were Never Really Here
programme.desc: (2017) Drama starring Joaquin Phoenix. A disturbed war veteran earns a living forcibly rescuing abducted girls. But one job spirals out of control.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: (1997) Comedy sequel starring Alex D. Linz as a resourceful boy who's stranded at home with chickenpox when a top-secret military microchip comes his way. Can he keep it safe from crooks?

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.desc: (1954) George Orwell's cautionary tale reimagined in cartoon form. A farm's animals revolt against their abusive owner only for the pigs to become drunk with their newly found power.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: (2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: (1992) Family comedy. Macaulay Culkin ends up in a swish New York hotel while his family are in Miami. But the burglars he defeated before (Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern) are back...

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: (2022) Action with Liam Neeson as a septuagenarian hitman; Monica Bellucci as a villain who hires hitmen to hit him, and Guy Pearce as an FBI agent investigating it all.

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: (2022) Epic Viking saga starring Alexander Skarsgrd as a warrior prince who goes on the rampage to Iceland to avenge his murdered father. With Ethan Hawke, Nicole Kidman and Bjrk.

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: (1964) Horror with Vincent Price and Jane Asher, based on an Edgar Allen Poe story. Satanist Prince Prospero treats people like puppets. But he can't escape the coming plague.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: (2019) Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jennifer Garner, Mila Kunis, John Oliver and Matthew Broderick. A girl's imaginary theme park comes to life when her mum goes to hospital.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Eagle

programme.desc: Queen Bee, Winter and Elliot: Pete helps a withdrawn pregnant Malinois regain strength so she can care for her 11 lively pups, and falls for Winter, a Staffie who is covered in scars.

programme.title: One Born Every Minute

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The fly-on-the-wall documentary series set in Liverpool Women's Hospital continues. A mother is prepared to risk her own life to have the big family she has always craved.

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
